bs-flaggedrevsconnector-extension-descri: Adds support for FlaggedRevs to a range of other extensions.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-draftgroups: Show unstable pages for following groups
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autoreview: Automatically set the page to stable, when the workflow was finished successfully
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autodeletew: Automatically delete the workflow, when a page was marked as stable
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-unmarked-d: There are no approved versions of this page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-desc: This is a draft version with [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}|action=history}} $1 changes in review]. The corresponding [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}|stable=1}} stable version] was approved on $2.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-notenabled: FlaggedRevs is not enabled for this page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-pending-de: There are pending changes waiting for approval. [$1 View now].
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-review-help: On approval, this draft version will replace the current stable version of the page. Do you want to accept the draft version?
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-bookshelfsh: Bookshelf: List pages without stable revision
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-uemodulepdf: UEModulePDF: Show FlaggedRevs info below main heading
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-success: Page successfully reviewed. The page will be reloaded now.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-failure: An error occurred. Please contact your administrator.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-state-s: The state of the page. Can be 'Approved' (latest version has been successfully reviewed), 'In revision' (there is a draft version of that page) or 'Approval requested' (a review workflow has been started on the existing draft version).
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-date-se: The date and time of the successful review of that page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-user-se: The user that reviewed the page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-version: The number of approved revisions in the page history
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-intro: Here you can see the current approval state of the page and approve new versions.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-state-int: State of approval for this page:
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pagetool-switcht: Switch to the latest draft version of this page
Switch to the approved version of this page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-draft-lockdown-r: The action "$1" for the draft version of this page is only available for the {{PLURAL:$2|group|groups}} $3
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-implicit-d: Page is approved, but there is changes in the included resources
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-reso: Page is a draft due to changes in included resources
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-resource-changes: Changes to included resources since the last page approval
apihelp-bs-flaggedpages-store-summary: Provides data for pages, that are under approval control
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-wfactivity-error: Specified revision does not match the title specified
"pageId" provided does not match any valid Title objects
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-bookshelfsh: Inserts a publishing log at the beginning of the PDF. This log shows, when a page was accepted. If no comment was added during acceptance, the comment field is empty.
Inserts a log at the beginning of the PDF. This log shows all PDF pages with status "draft".
Inserts a log at the beginning of the PDF. This log shows all PDF pages from namespaces without activated review functionality.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-uemodulepdf: Prints the timestamp for the latest accepted and draft versions below the title on the PDF.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autodeletew: The workflow is deleted automatically and a new workflow can be started.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-draftgroups: Sets the access right to draft versions. If no group is listed, even sysop-user do not see a visual status in the title area. Sysop-users can still access draft in the version history, however.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-indexingsta: Draft versions are excluded from search results. If a page has no stable version, it is not shown in the search results.
